<section style="background-color: #F0EFEB; padding: 3.5rem 1.5rem; text-align: center;">
  <div style="max-width: 500px; margin: 0 auto;">
    <h3 style="font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: 1.5rem; color: #2B2B2B; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Stay Updated on Events</h3>
    <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; color: #5A5955; margin-bottom: 1.25rem; font-size: 0.95rem;">Subscribe to receive event announcements, updates, and prayer requests.</p>

    <form name="event-newsletter" method="POST" data-netlify="true" style="display: flex; gap: 0.5rem;">
      <input type="hidden" name="form-name" value="event-newsletter" />
      <input type="email" name="email" placeholder="Your email address" required
        style="flex: 1; padding: 0.75rem 1rem; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px 0 0 8px; font-size: 0.95rem; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; background: #FFFFFF; min-height: 48px;">
      <button type="submit"
        style="background-color: #1F5E3B; color: #FFFFFF; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 0.95rem; padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0; border: none; cursor: pointer; min-height: 48px; transition: background-color 200ms ease; white-space: nowrap;">
        Subscribe
      </button>
    </form>
    <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 0.8rem; color: #8A8985; margin-top: 0.75rem;">We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.</p>
  </div>

  <style>
    @media (max-width: 480px) {
      form[style*="display: flex"][style*="gap: 0.5rem"] {
        flex-direction: column !important;
      }
      form[style*="display: flex"][style*="gap: 0.5rem"] input {
        border-radius: 8px !important;
      }
      form[style*="display: flex"][style*="gap: 0.5rem"] button {
        border-radius: 8px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
</section>

<section style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2B2B2B 0%, #1a2e23 60%, #2B2B2B 100%); padding: 3.5rem 1.5rem; text-align: center;">
  <div style="max-width: 700px; margin: 0 auto;">
    <h2 style="font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif; font-size: clamp(1.75rem, 3vw, 2.25rem); color: #FFFFFF; margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600;">
      Ready to Get Involved?
    </h2>
    <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-size: 1.05rem; color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8); line-height: 1.7; margin-bottom: 2rem;">
      Can't attend an event right now? There are many other ways to support Y.E.T. Compassion and our community.
    </p>
    <div style="display: flex; gap: 1rem; justify-content: center; flex-wrap: wrap;">
      <a href="/get-involved.html" style="display: inline-block; background-color: #C9A227; color: #2B2B2B; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 700; font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.85rem 2rem; border-radius: 8px; text-decoration: none; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(201,162,39,0.3); transition: all 200ms ease;">
        Get Involved
      </a>
      <a href="/donate.html" style="display: inline-block; background: transparent; color: #FFFFFF; font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.85rem 2rem; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.5); text-decoration: none; transition: all 200ms ease;">
        Donate
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>
